p: Cannabis oil preparation (50 mg weighted) was added to 5 ml of methanol. The mixture was extracted by vortex and centrifuged (1789 × g, 5 min). Then, 50 µl of the supernatant was withdrawn and added with 50 µl of the internal standard solution (methyl oleate, 175 μg/ml in MeOH). The solvent was evaporated, then 50 µl of BSTFA-1% TMCS and 50 µl of toluene were added. The mixture was mixed and heated at 70°C for 30 min, to allow the derivatization.
